channel.title: Notes on Akhil Simha
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Akhil Simha

item.title: Linker
item.description: The linker file (or linker script) plays a crucial role in embedded systems development, defining how the program’s sections (like code, data, and stack) are placed in the memory map of the target device.

item.title: Interrupts
item.description: What is an Interrupt? In an embedded system, an interrupt is a hardware or software signal that temporarily halts the normal execution of a program to service a higher-priority event.
